original_text: But the people of Dan took what Micah had made, and the priest who belonged to him, and they came to Laish, to a people quiet and unsuspecting, and struck them with the edge of the sword and burned the city with fire.
korean_text: 단 자손이 미가가 만든 것과 그 제사장을 취하여 라이스에 이르러 한가하고 걱정 없이 사는 백성을 만나 칼날로 그들을 치며 그 성읍을 불사르되

sentences.original_text: But the people of Dan took what Micah had made
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 단 지파 사람들은 미가가 만든 것을 가져갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and the priest who belonged to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그에게 속하던 제사장도 데리고 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: to a people quiet and unsuspecting
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에는 조용하고 아무런 경계심도 없는 백성이 살고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and struck them with the edge of the sword
and burned the city with fire
